mapper.select: SELECT ensign_image_url ensignImageUrl,language_name languageName, `language`.id FROM lt_language `language` WHERE `language`.`status` = 'putaway' AND `language`.hot_or_not = 'yes'

SELECT `language`.thumbnail_image_url, `language`.language_name, `language`.language_intro, `language`.price, `language`.discount_price, `language`.discount_end_time, course.id courseId FROM lt_language `language` LEFT JOIN lt_course course ON `language`.id = course.language_id WHERE `language`.`status` = 'putaway' AND NOW() BETWEEN `language`.discount_start_time AND `language`.discount_end_time

SELECT `language`.video_path,`language`.id, `language`.language_name, `language`.language_intro, `language`.language_lightspot, `language`.purchase_notes, `language`.price languserPrice, `language`.discount_price languageDiscountPrice, `level`.level_name levelName,`level`.id levelId, course.id courseId,course.certificate_or_not certificateOrNot, course.certificate_title certificateTitle, course.certificate_image_url certificateImageUrl, course.certificate_intro certificateIntro, course.course_name courseName, course.price coursePrice, course.discount_price courseDiscountPrice FROM lt_language `language` LEFT JOIN lt_course `course` ON `language`.id = course.language_id LEFT JOIN lt_level `level` ON course.id = `level`.course_id LEFT JOIN lt_chapter `chapter` ON `level`.id = chapter.level_id WHERE `language`.`status` = 'putaway' AND course.`status` = 'putaway' AND `language`.id = #{id}
SELECT la.id languageId,la.ensign_image_url,la.language_name FROM lt_language la WHERE la.status = 'putaway' ORDER BY CONVERT(la.language_name USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci
